catalog_script_client.name: Auto Populate Email field

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_d24ad6a2935f261005b6367efaba10bf
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Request Desktop or Laptop">5fc33510939ba25005b6367efaba1027</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:67cbb958939ba25005b6367efaba10ee</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Auto Populate Email field</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }

    //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below

    var ga = new GlideAjax('GetCustomEmail');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getCustomEmail');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_user_id', newValue);
    ga.getXMLAnswer(function(response) {
        g_form.setValue('email_address', response);
    });

    console.log('response = ', response);
    console.log('New value = ', newValue);

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-14 16:06:14</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>d24ad6a2935f261005b6367efaba10bf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Auto Populate Email field</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="MyServiceDesk" source="x_1808462_mysdesk">bcb2fd1c935ba25005b6367efaba10ed</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="MyServiceDesk">bcb2fd1c935ba25005b6367efaba10ed</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_d24ad6a2935f261005b6367efaba10bf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-14 16:47:48</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
